pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: American Radio Archives, Thousand Oaks Library Foundation
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Contains scripts for radio and television series, 1930-1954, including Captain Post: Crime Specialist, 1930-1931, Chinatown Squad, 1932, Barbary Coast Nights, 1933, I Love a Mystery, 1943-1944, 1949-1952, Adventures by Morse, 1944-1945, His Honor the Barber, 1945-1946, I Love Adventure, 1948, Slice of Life, 1949, Mixed Doubles, 1949, One Man's Family, 1949, 1951-1952, and Family Skeleton, 1953-1954. Also contains some memorabilia on Morse's career (awards, clippings, etc.) and production documents related to particular series.
